```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

importing and cleaning nyc nooa dataset
```{r}
noaa_df = 
 read_csv("nynoaadat.csv", na = c("NA", ".", "")) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(date >= "2008-01-01", id == "USC00300023")
```

```{r}
noaa_df %>%
ggplot(aes(x = date, y = prcp)) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)
```
